name: Solar System (itch) (beaupa)
description:
This project is for Michigan State University course

Assignment Work

Three extra planets added to simulation (textured, sound and scripted as full game objects

  1. Mars
  2. Jupiter
  3. Mercury
  • Planets are rotating around the sun (in relatively correct size and position)
  • Planets are selectable (switches camera)
  • The comet spawner is rotating around the scene and shooting trailing projectile comets
    • These comets are also selectable (if your quick enough)
  • Screenshots of work is there
    • Hierarchy shot done > gameObjects
    • Project Assets shot done > project assets
